#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long int t,b,l;
	double a,k;
	a=log10(2.718281828459);
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld",&b);
        k=a*double(b);
        l=floor(k+1);
        printf("%lld\n",l);
    }
    return 0;
}
